meanings.definition: To estimate too highly; to overvalue.
meanings.sent1: I tend to overestimate how long it will take me to finish my homework.
meanings.sent2: She always overestimates the number of guests who will attend her party.
meanings.sent3: Don't overestimate the size of the cake; we don't want any leftovers!
meanings.sent4: His excitement overestimated the importance of the event.
meanings.sent5: Try not to overestimate your abilities; it's better to be pleasantly surprised.
